title: The Killer Is Also Romantic
overview: Si Xiao Nian, the graceful owner of a garment shop, and Yan Wu Ming, a gentleman of the Qing Dynasty, tied the knot. However, on the day of their wedding, the two left one after another. It turned out that both of them were hiding their true identities. Facing their deep love and secrets in their hearts, the two fall into a deep entanglement...
